bioconda.name: bioconductor-synlet
bioconda.summary: Hits Selection for Synthetic Lethal RNAi Screen Data

biotools.summary: Select hits from synthetic lethal RNAi screen data. The interest is to find genes that lead to stronger lethal effect when they are knocked-down further by siRNA, implementing quality control and various visualisation tools. Four different algorithms could be used to pick up the interesting hits.

bioschemas.name: synlet
